title: Economic Survey: Need diversified energy sources to overcome transition challenges
description: India’s energy needs are expected to grow 2-2.5 times by 2047 to meet a growing economy's developmental priorities and aspirations, it said. The major challenges facing India’s energy transition are technology, raw materials, availability and access to affordable finance, and availability of land, the survey said.
